casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Vahig A. Vartanian (12753)

Schaller, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued October 27 decision released November 22, 1994 G. Russell Stewart III, for the appellant (defendant). Leah Hawley, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were C. Robert Satti, Sr., state’s attorney, and Stephen Carney, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
